How to escalate my NDR reattempt request using shiprocket mobile app?

* Here's how you can escalate your NDR reattempt request:
   * Open Orders page from the bottom menu.
   * Go to In-transit tab and filter out your "Undelivered" order. Alternatively, you can also search your order ID on the home page.
   * Select your order and click on the ‘Get Help’ button. 
   * Here, select the ‘Non-Delivery Escalation’ from the options and then click on Reattempt or you can click on the Contact Buyer > Initiate call button to contact your buyer directly from the app.
   * Go ahead and attach any proof in the form of call recording, or chat screenshots. You can also get a missed call from your buyer's registered mobile number on the displayed phone number. We will consider this "missed call" as a reattempt verification response.   
   * Enter your remarks and escalate your reattempt request. 
   * Important Points to Remember:
      * Proofs are not mandatory at the time of escalation. However, it is advisable to always escalate your reattempt request with valid proofs to increase the chances of delivery. 
      * You have 6 attempts to escalate/re-escalate an NDR reattempt request.

How to process an NDR shipment using shiprocket mobile app?

* Shiprocket users can now take action on their NDR shipments directly from their mobile app. Please follow the steps below to know more:
   * Open Orders page from the bottom menu.
   * Go to In-transit tab and filter out your "Undelivered" order. Alternatively, you can also search your order ID on the home page.
   * Select your order and click on Get Help on the next screen.
   * Click on the "Non-Delivery Escalation" tab to take any action. You can either:
      * Make a reattempt request
      * Mark it RTO, or
      * Contact Buyer
* If you opt for reattempt and the reason shared by the courier company is incorrect:
   * Provide proof in the form of a chat screenshot, or upload your conversation with your buyer. You can also get a missed call from your buyer's registered mobile number on the displayed phone number. We will consider this "missed call" as a reattempt verification response.  
* If you opt for reattempt and the reason shared by the courier company is correct:
   * Select a reattempt date and provide the required details. 
* If you want to mark your shipment RTO:
   * In this case, your order will be returned to the original pickup location. You can also add remarks if you have any. 
* Note: Courier partners only make 3 attempts to deliver your order to the end customer post which they will mark your order as RTO.

Where can I see the NDR dashboard using shiprocket mobile app?

1. Login to your shiprocket app.
2. Scroll the home page to the bottom, and clickon the 'View All Metrics' Tab.
3. Select NDR, from the header.
4. Here you will find your NDR dashboard.
5. You can also change the dates according the data required.

How can i check for my NDR shipments in shiprocket mobile app?

For checking the NDR shipments, follow these steps:
1. Click on the 'Orders' tab present in the footer of the page and go to In-transit tab.
2. Here you can check for the NDR shipments by filtering 'Undelivered' orders.
3. For searching a particular shipment you can enter the AWB/Order ID/ Phone number associated with the order in the search bar present on the top of the page.
4. For applying some particular filter, click on the 'Filters' button present on the top right corner.
5. Here you can apply the filters required.
